short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Censors profane words and blocks them on websites. For example, the word cat becomes c**.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WordGuard censors profane words and blocks them on websites. For example, the word cat becomes c**. 
This is useful for those live-streaming to prevent bans or sanctions due to inappropriate words popping up. It's also useful if you have children surfing the web and you'd like to prevent them from seeing certain words. WordGuard is also useful if you don't like seeing certain words in your day to day browsing and blocks them out before you can see them and increase your productivity.
